text: Thompson Usiyan (27 April 1956 â€“ 31 August 2021) was a Nigerian professional footballer. He played as a forward. He was a member of the Nigerian Olympic soccer which boycotted the 1976 Olympics. He made many appearances for the Nigeria national team. Usiyan died on 31 August 2021 at the age of 65.Ex- international, others mourn ex-Eagles striker Usiyan ==References== Category:1956 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Nigerian footballers
title: Thompson Usiyan
